EmailTemplate.description: Notify applicant that department has received their reinstatement application
EmailTemplate.name: Credential Reinstatement Application Received
EmailTemplate.subject: DSPS Reinstatement Application Received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Today()}
Dear {!Renewal_Application__c.Applicant__c},
Thank you for submitting your reinstatement application ({!Renewal_Application__c.Name}) with the Department of Safety and Professional Services. Please allow 7-10 business days for processing of your credential.
If you have any questions please contact the agency during business hours at (608) 266-2112, or send an email to dsps@wisconsin.gov.
Sincerely,
Department of Safety and Professional Services
